original_text: I have spoken to you with words and stories that are like pictures. But there will be a time when I will not speak like that any more. Instead, I will speak clearly to you about the Father.
korean_text: 이것을 비유로 너희에게 일렀거니와 때가 이르면 다시는 비유로 너희에게 이르지 않고 아버지에 대한 것을 밝히 이르리라

sentences.original_text: I have spoken to you with words
and stories that are like pictures
But there will be a time
when I will not speak like that any more
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 그렇게 말하지 아니할 때가

sentences.original_text: Instead, I will speak clearly to you
